content: I'm making prototype for FHIR searching practitioners. I'm using unsecured test.fhir.org/r3 server to access test data for my app. I would like to get data from server over https. How can I get security credentials to access test.fhir.org over https? If it is not possible can someone suggest which test server I can use? Thanks in advance

the way test.fhir.org is designed, if you use https, you have to login through OAuth. You can go to https://test.fhir.org/r3, and use an account from google, or HL7, or I can create one directly if you PM me directly
